name: Boum boum
description:
- part 1 of my summer prototypes -

BOUMBOUM is a top down shooter on a planet with a local gravity.

Move with the arrow keys/ ZQSD/WASD

Aim with the mouse

Left click to shoot

Bullets don't kill you, but they kill the blue cubes 

Those ones can kill you

I may or may not add 3D models to this game, it's only cubes and spheres for now

music's from Hotline Miami's OST : Hydrogen - Moon

Credit goes to the artist
